backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with booking, provider, rental, and user profile types and state, plus authorization‑protected profile getters and setters.
backend/migration.mo: Implements a migration that drops the old persistent logo field while preserving existing state maps.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries detailing files and components involved in removing logo rendering and related UI logic.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/custom CSS defining color variables, themes, and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the root React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures routing and layout for all site pages using TanStack Router with header, footer, and toasts.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen showing an access denied message with an option to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with visual state and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireLogi: Wrapper component that shows a login prompt unless the user is authenticated.
frontend/src/components/bookings/Booking: Renders a status badge based on booking status with predefined labels and variants.
frontend/src/components/forms/OptionalPh: Provides an optional image upload component with preview and remove functionality.
frontend/src/components/layout/PageLayou: Wraps pages with configurable max-width and optional title and description headers.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Displays site footer with navigation links, branding, and dynamic year attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Renders site header with navigation, mobile menu, and login-related actions.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useBooking.t: Fetches a single booking by ID using react-query and the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateOpt: Creates an optician booking and invalidates customer booking queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateRen: Creates a rental booking and refreshes customer bookings on success.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCreateRep: Creates a repair booking and invalidates customer booking data upon completion.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useCustomerB: Retrieves all bookings for the current customer via the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useProviderB: Fetches provider-related bookings when an actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/bookings/useUpdateBoo: Updates a booking’s status and invalidates related queries after mutation.
Fetches provider data tied to the current identity and offers a provider onboarding mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/rentals/useRentalCata: Loads the rental item catalog using the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, managing identity load, login, and state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, plus utility classes for layout spacing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up React root rendering with React Query and Internet Identity providers, loading the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/BookingDetai: Displays detailed booking information with status, metadata, and navigation, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/mobile-optic: Presents booking confirmation details for a mobile optician service, including status and cost summary.
Provides a form to create a mobile optician booking, calculates pricing, and submits data via a booking hook.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/MyBookingsPa: Shows the logged‑in user’s bookings with status badges, schedule info, and links to detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/rentals/Rent: Displays confirmation details for a completed rental booking, loading booking data and showing status, fees, and navigation actions.
Handles creating a rental booking by selecting rental days and address, calculating price, and submitting the booking.
frontend/src/pages/bookings/repairs/Repa: Shows confirmation and details for a submitted repair request, including status, repair info, and navigation options.
Provides a form to submit a repair request with issue type, details, address, preferred time, and optional photo, then creates a booking.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero section, service listings, and a how‑it‑works flow using navigation and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderDash: Provider dashboard showing profile info, provider bookings, and tools to update booking statuses.
frontend/src/pages/provider/ProviderOnbo: Form for new providers to register by entering personal info, service areas, and offered services.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalItemDet: Displays details for a single rental item, including availability, pricing, and features, with loading and not-found states.
frontend/src/pages/rentals/RentalsCatalo: Shows a searchable and filterable catalog of rental items with category selection and availability indicators.
frontend/src/pages/services/MobileOptici: Presents information about the mobile optician service with features and a booking button.
Explains eyewear rental benefits and features, linking users to the rental catalog.
Describes repair services offered, including a service list and a booking option.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, extended theme options, and animation keyframes using typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing versions, features, and pending requests focused on removing all logo-related UI, assets, and backend logic.
